definition: to confine/to lock up/to pen in
circle/ring/loop/classifier for loops, orbits, laps of race etc/CL:個|个[ge4]/to surround/to circle

sentences.english: The staggering totals indicate why McGrady needed to get to the hoop.
sentences.chinese: 摇摆不定的数据表明了为什么麦迪需要更靠近篮圈。

sentences.english: Mutombo's strength is defending the paint and the rim.
sentences.chinese: 穆大叔的能力仅仅是防守内线和篮圈。

sentences.english: The object of the game is to score points by putting the ball through a net basket.
sentences.chinese: 这项运动的目标是把球投进篮圈中得分。

sentences.english: The Spurs never had an easy look at the basket.
sentences.chinese: 今天马刺在篮圈面前没有讨到好脸色。

sentences.english: It was as if Ron Ron forgot he had to actually try to put the ball in the hole.
sentences.chinese: 阿泰似乎忘记了他实际上应该将球投入篮圈。

sentences.english: But that hoop allowed the Cavs to cover.
sentences.chinese: 但是篮圈允许骑士队稍稍挽回点颜面。

sentences.english: The utility model relates to a clasp type basket hoop, which belongs to a physical training apparatus.
sentences.chinese: 一种卡环式篮圈，本实用新型属于体育锻炼设备。

sentences.english: The first picture shows a basketball soaring through the air toward the hoop.
sentences.chinese: 第一个画面显示了一个腾越空中向篮圈飞去的篮球。

definition: to collude with/to collaborate/(basketball) hook shot
sports such as ping-pong and badminton that use small balls/see also 大球[da4 qiu2]
